entry.title: [France][Internet Access] - FTTH
entry.content:
Jul 22, 14:43 UTC
Resolved - The incident has been resolved.
If you still have a problem, please restart your modem to restore your access. If the behavior persists, please contact our support.
We are sorry for the inconvenience.

Jul 22, 14:01 UTC
Update - An intervention is in progress on the equipment of our collection operator.
We invite you to restart your modem to restore access to your services.

Jul 22, 08:03 UTC
Update - The Fiber provider is currently working on its Infrastructure to solve the problem.
However, some initially affected accesses are now available.

The root cause has not yet been identified.

Jul 21, 10:41 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 21/07/2022 10:00 UTC
Service impact : Service interruption on some access might be observed
Ongoing actions : Interventions are in progress in order to correct in a perennial way as fast as possible. We apologize for the inconvenience caused.

entry.title: [RBX/GRA/SBG][Webcloud] - Mailbox access
entry.content:
Jul 22, 09:02 UTC
Monitoring - Start time : 22/07/2022 07:30 UTC
Service status: Actually, mailbox access from Outlook to ex3.mail.ovh.net and mail delivery function properly.
Root cause : Authentication of customers on their email account had a malfunction.
Ongoing actions : We place the incident under monitoring to confirm the resolution of the authentication issues.

Jul 22, 07:43 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 22/07/2022 07:30 UTC
Service impact : Mailbox access from Outlook to ex3.mail.ovh.net may not function properly. Mail delivery may also be delayed.
Ongoing actions : Our technicians are currently working on in order to fix it.

entry.title: [All][Voip] - T53w
entry.content:
Jul 12, 14:15 UTC
Resolved - Start time : 11/07/2022 20:00 UTC
End time : 12/07/2022 12:00 UTC
Service impact : Some T53w failed to upgrade.
Our technical teams resolved the issue. Impacted T53w are working as prior the incident.

Jul 12, 09:25 UTC
Update - Update :T53w needs a manual reboot to retrieve the new provisioning parameters. Please restart your phone by unplugging/replugging the power supply or PoE access, T53w will restart with the previous firmware version.

Jul 12, 08:15 UTC
Investigating - Start time : 11/07/2022 20:00UTC
Service impact : Some T53w failed to upgrade after this task https://web-cloud.status-ovhcloud.com/incidents/d3npvdv6hpcr. Phones are stucked at 90% of the upgrade process.
Ongoing actions : We are updating our provisioning scripts.
